title.rendered: Summer Reading Lists + Armed Forces Day

content.rendered:
Teacher Appreciation Event

Over 100 teachers attended our teacher appreciation event in Macon and Warner Robins on Tuesday night! Teachers can still receive a 20% discount on used books and educational products through May 6.

Summer Reading Lists

Get ahead of your summer assignments by bringing us your summer reading lists!

Armed Forces Day

We are so thankful for the men and women who serve or have served our country. On May 21, active and retired military will receive 20% off of used books and Melissa & Doug products.

excerpt.rendered: We are so thankful for the men and women who serve or have served our country. On May 21, active and retired military will receive 20% off of used books and Melissa & Doug products.
